summary: Kill the \'Gianta Claus\' to get Far East Xmas Armor!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#8B0000] [heading] Now With The Fixed Visible Gianta Claus! [/heading] [/color]

Simple mod that add \'Gianta Claus\' and armor.
the \'Far East Xmas armor\' can forge with \'Gianta\'s Gift\'
you can obtain it from Gianta Claus
and Gianta Claus can be find anywhere that giants appear

See the Screen shots for simple progression
author: justice

files.name: Far East Xmas Armor Gianta Fix
